StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_dbaUpdateCandidateStatusE.ec.veDateCN]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@nwa_id int, @status_e._date date.me, @user_login varchar(15)
AS
declare @candidate_status_id int
if (SELECT count(candidate_status_id) FROM CANDIDATE_STATUS WHERE NWA_ID = @nwa_id AND STATUS_CODE='C' AND DISPOSITION_CODE='N') > 1 begin print '-------------------------------DATA--------------------------------------' print 'NWA_ID: ' + convert(varchar(10),@nwa_id) print '------------------------------OUTPUT----------------------------------' print 'More than one SHIPPER/RECRUIT record exists!' print 'Record NOT UPDATED!' print 'Please analyze CANDIDATE_STATUS entries before upda.ng!' print '------------------------------END-----------------------------------------' end else begin set @candidate_status_id=(SELECT candidate_status_id FROM CANDIDATE_STATUS WHERE NWA_ID = @nwa_id AND STATUS_CODE='C' AND DISPOSITION_CODE='N') print '-------------------------------DATA--------------------------------------' print 'NWA_ID: ' + convert(varchar(15),@nwa_id) print 'CAND_STATUS_ID: ' + convert(varchar(15),@candidate_status_id) print '------------------------------OUTPUT----------------------------------' print 'Only one SHIPPER/RECRUIT record exists!' print 'Record UPDATED!' print '------------------------------END-----------------------------------------'
update candidate_status set user_login=@user_login, update_date=getdate(), status_e.ec.ve_date=@status_e._date where candidate_status_id = @candidate_status_id
end
